channel.title: [508] TrexxScape [508] [Day 5]
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]Hello, I figured I should start a topic on my new server I will be creating over a few weeks maybe even months.[/b][/size]
I decided after a 2 year break from coding/hosting I shall start again! :D It took me forever to find a 508 S+C that didn't have broken links or corrupt files. :mad: Now, I have only been coding for about 2 or 3 days but that doesn't mean I haven't added or coded anything. I have fixed various bugs/glitches/items already and coded the shops and other stuff. I stripped InsidiaX's source and client and pretty much fixed what he left broken. (not saying he isn't a great coder :))
Now, on to the media huh? :D
[size=12pt][b]Added a "Sell All' button. (Plan on adding a "Buy X" button to)[/b][/size] [img]http://i1281.photobucket.com/albums/a501/hellboy9890233/Mobile%20Uploads/2014-04/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000066_zpsfd5sywg7.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Added Gold/Green/Red/Blue charms to the summoning shop![/b][/size] [img]http://i1281.photobucket.com/albums/a501/hellboy9890233/Mobile%20Uploads/2014-04/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000067_zps56yicljx.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Fixed general store stock. (It seriously sucked)[/b][/size] [img]http://i1281.photobucket.com/albums/a501/hellboy9890233/Mobile%20Uploads/2014-04/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000065_zpso8j16klk.jpg[/img]
Now, I know this doesn't look like a lot. But remember I have only been at it for 2 or 3 days and I do have school. Now, as for the shops they have a colored names.
Under Construction Slowly working on this shop Finished shop
I have also edited the cache a little. I will be updating daily except for on the weekends! (unless I have nothing to do.)
I plan on adding/coding much, much, much more content. This is the first time I have started a source/client and plan to release it. All feedback (even negative) is welcome! I enjoy hearing every ones thoughts. ;D
[size=10pt][b]P.S. If you have any ideas or tips I would love to hear them. :P[/b][/size]
EDIT: I have editing the cache, I changed a lot of logo/frame colors. The servers 2 main colors are obviously Blue/Black. So that is probably why you'll be seeing a lot of stuff that is Blue/Black. It's not done but when it is I will upload photos!
~Rexxy

item.title: [508] TrexxScape [508] [Day 5]
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

[size=12pt]Hello, I figured I should start a topic on my new server I will be creating over a few weeks maybe even months.[/size]

I decided after a 2 year break from coding/hosting I shall start again!
It took me forever to find a 508 S+C that didn’t have broken links or corrupt files. :mad:
Now, I have only been coding for about 2 or 3 days but that doesn’t mean I haven’t added or coded anything.
I have fixed various bugs/glitches/items already and coded the shops and other stuff.
I stripped InsidiaX’s source and client and pretty much fixed what he left broken. (not saying he isn’t a great coder :))

Now, on to the media huh?

[size=12pt]Added a "Sell All’ button. (Plan on adding a “Buy X” button to)[/size]

[size=12pt]Added Gold/Green/Red/Blue charms to the summoning shop![/size]

[size=12pt]Fixed general store stock. (It seriously sucked)[/size]

Now, I know this doesn’t look like a lot. But remember I have only been at it for 2 or 3 days and I do have school.
Now, as for the shops they have a colored names.

Under Construction
Slowly working on this shop
Finished shop

I have also edited the cache a little. I will be updating daily except for on the weekends! (unless I have nothing to do.)

I plan on adding/coding much, much, much more content. This is the first time I have started a source/client and plan to release it.
All feedback (even negative) is welcome! I enjoy hearing every ones thoughts. ;D

[size=10pt]P.S. If you have any ideas or tips I would love to hear them. [/size]

EDIT: I have editing the cache, I changed a lot of logo/frame colors. The servers 2 main colors are obviously Blue/Black.
So that is probably why you’ll be seeing a lot of stuff that is Blue/Black. It’s not done but when it is I will upload photos!

~Rexxy
